steps.1: pat-pat rinsed mushrooms dry with a paper towel
steps.3: cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
steps.4: add-Once the pan is hot, add the mushrooms
steps.5: Add-Add chopped shallot to the pan
steps.9: cook-cook for 3-5 minutes, stirring often, until mushrooms start to soften and brown
steps.11: Heat-Heat 1 tbsp olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
steps.12: Transfer-Transfer the contents of the pan to a serving dish
steps.13: cook-cook the pan, often stirring, for 1 minute
steps.15: Add-1/4 tbsp balsamic vinegar to the pan
steps.16: Add-Add 2 cloves of minced garlic to the pan
